          <title>
            <string language="fr">Aucune réfraction de la lumière à 90 le long de la limite</string>
            <string language="en">No light refraction at 90 along the boundary</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Keine helle Brechung bei 90 entlang der Grenze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nenhum refraction claro em 90 ao longo do limite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nessuna rifrazione chiara a 90 lungo il contorno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμία ελαφριά διάθλαση σε 90 κατά μήκος του ορίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ninguna refracción ligera en 90 a lo largo del 
límite</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que la lumière n'est pas réfractée et n'a pas changé de direction si la lumière frappe la limite à 90.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that light is not refracted and didn't change direction when light stroke the boundary at 90.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="fr">air</string>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Licht nicht refracted
und nicht Richtung änderte, wenn hell, streichen die Grenze bei 90.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a luz não refracted
e não mudou o sentido quando clara afaga o limite em 90.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la luce non 
refracted e non ha cambiato il senso una volta chiara segna il 
contorno a 90.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι το φως δεν διαθλιέται 
και δεν άλλαξε την κατεύθυνση όταν ελαφρύ κτυπά το όριο σε 
90.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la luz no está 
refractada y no cambió la dirección cuando es ligera frota 
ligeramente el límite en 90.</string>
          </description>
